name: D.A.P.U's Victory
victoryScreenHeader:
Complete all the portal parts
to win!
victoryString: Hey, We've finally finished the portal. I just hope that it will bring us back, including the other factions who isn't from this universe. Anyways, let's go!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!
